para.text: Each drawing in sPlan can have its own form. The form is, so to speak, a separate drawing level that lies below the actual drawing. In the normal working mode, the form is only visible visually, but you cannot select or edit any elements of the form. In this way, the form in the background does not interfere with normal work with sPlan.
